name: Small Claims Complaint
description: Form for filing a small claims court case for monetary disputes under the jurisdictional limit

sections.title: SMALL CLAIMS COURT COMPLAINT
sections.content:
IN THE SMALL CLAIMS COURT OF {filing_court}

{plaintiff_name}, Plaintiff
vs.
{defendant_name}, Defendant

sections.title: 1. PARTIES
2. JURISDICTION
sections.content: This court has jurisdiction over this matter as the amount in controversy does not exceed the jurisdictional limit for small claims in this court, and either the defendant resides in this jurisdiction or the events giving rise to this claim occurred within this jurisdiction.

sections.title: 3. STATEMENT OF CLAIM
sections.content:
On or about {incident_date}, the following occurred:

{claim_description}

sections.title: 4. DEMAND LETTER
sections.content: Prior to filing this complaint, I sent a demand letter to the defendant on {demand_letter_date} requesting payment, but the matter remains unresolved.

sections.title: 5. SUPPORTING EVIDENCE
sections.content:
The following evidence supports my claim:

{supporting_evidence}

sections.title: 6. WITNESSES
sections.content:
The following individuals have relevant information regarding this claim:

{witnesses}

sections.title: 7. DAMAGES
8. REMEDY REQUESTED
sections.content:
I am requesting the following remedy:

{remedy_requested}

sections.title: 9. CERTIFICATION
